name: cloudflare-turnstile-widget
description: Framework agnostic widget for Cloudflare's free-to-use CAPTCHA service, Cloudflare Turnstile.

scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run serve:silent
scripts.serve: ((node -e "if (!require('fs').existsSync('./example/node_modules')) { process.exit(1) } ") || (cd ./example && npm i && npm run start)) && cd ./example && npm run start
scripts.serve:silent: ((node -e "if (!require('fs').existsSync('./example/node_modules')) { process.exit(1) } ") || (cd ./example && npm i && npm run start:silent)) && cd ./example && npm run start:silent
